StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateWorkingFile]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FormId uniqueiden..er, @PersonId uniqueiden..er, @Sec.onId uniqueiden..er, @FolderId uniqueiden..er, @FormTemplateId uniqueiden..er, @FriendlyName varchar(50), @Extension char(3), @FileSize bigint, @IsValidated bit, @IsSigned bit, @Data image, @UserName varchar(50) ) AS DECLARE @retVal int
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [AFP].[USMC].[Form] WHERE FormId = @FormId) BEGIN -- Before upda.ng, archive the old record if IsValidated or IsSigned DELETE FROM [AFP].[USMC].[WorkingFileArchive] WHERE FormId = @FormId AND IsSigned = @IsSigned AND IsValidated = @IsValidated
INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[WorkingFileArchive] SELECT newID(),* FROM [AFP].[USMC].[Form] WHERE FormId = @FormId AND IsSigned = @IsSigned AND IsValidated = @IsValidated
-- perform the update UPDATE [AFP].[USMC].[Form] SET PersonId = @PersonId ,Sec.onId = @Sec.onId ,FolderId = @FolderId ,FormTemplateId = @FormTemplateId ,FriendlyName = @FriendlyName ,Extension = @Extension ,FileSize = @FileSize ,IsValidated = @IsValidated ,IsSigned = @IsSigned ,UploadedBy = @UserName ,DateUploaded = GetDate() ,Data = @Data WHERE FormId = @FormId
-- Record the update in the history table. INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[FormHistory] ([FormId], [Ac.on] ,[Actor] ,[Ac.onDate]) VALUES (@FormId, 'Updated', @UserName, GetDate())
SET @retVal = 1 END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[Form] ([FormId] ,[PersonId] ,[Sec.onId] ,[FolderId] ,[FormTemplateId] ,[FriendlyName] ,[Extension] ,[FileSize] ,[IsValidated] ,[IsSigned] ,[UploadedBy] ,[DateUploaded] ,[Data]) VALUES (@FormId ,@PersonId ,@Sec.onId ,@FolderId ,@FormTemplateId ,@FriendlyName ,@Extension ,@FileSize ,@IsValidated ,@IsSigned ,@UserName ,GetDate() ,@Data)
-- Record the insert in the history table. INSERT INTO [AFP].[USMC].[FormHistory] ([FormId], [Ac.on] ,[Actor] ,[Ac.onDate]) VALUES (@FormId, 'Added', @UserName, GetDate())
SET @retVal = 0 END
SELECT @retVal
